title: Proven Safety Types Schema
description: JSON Schema definitions for Proven safety types - formally verified type constraints across 38 modules

SafeMath.title: Safe Math Module
SafeMath.description: Mathematical operations with overflow detection and safe arithmetic

NonNegativeInteger.title: Non-Negative Integer
NonNegativeInteger.description: Integer greater than or equal to zero

Range.title: Range
Range.description: Numeric range with min and max

SafeString.title: Safe String Module
SafeString.description: String operations with length limits, encoding validation, and injection prevention

NonEmptyString.title: Non-Empty String
NonEmptyString.description: String with at least one character

Identifier.title: Identifier
Identifier.description: Valid identifier (alphanumeric with underscores, starts with letter)

TrimmedString.title: Trimmed String
TrimmedString.description: String with no leading or trailing whitespace

SafePath.title: Safe Path Module
SafePath.description: File path operations without traversal attacks

RelativePath.title: Relative Path
RelativePath.description: Path relative to current directory (no traversal)

FileName.title: File Name
FileName.description: Valid file name without path separators

SafeUrl.title: Safe URL Module
SafeUrl.description: URL parsing, validation, and construction with injection prevention

HttpUrl.title: HTTP URL
HttpUrl.description: URL with http or https scheme

IPv4Address.title: IPv4 Address
IPv4Address.description: Valid IPv4 address in dotted decimal notation

SafeCrypto.title: Safe Crypto Module
SafeCrypto.description: Cryptographic operations with constant-time comparison and secure hashing

SafeUuid.title: Safe UUID Module
SafeUuid.description: UUID generation and validation for all versions

SafeCurrency.title: Safe Currency Module
SafeCurrency.description: Currency amounts with decimal precision and overflow protection

MonetaryAmount.title: Monetary Amount
MonetaryAmount.description: Currency amount with code and value

SafeHex.title: Safe Hex Module
SafeHex.description: Hexadecimal encoding and decoding with validation

SafeJson.title: Safe JSON Module
SafeJson.description: JSON parsing and validation with depth limits

SafeDatetime.title: Safe Datetime Module
SafeDatetime.description: Date and time operations with timezone handling

UnixTimestamp.title: Unix Timestamp
UnixTimestamp.description: Unix timestamp in seconds since epoch

UnixTimestampMs.title: Unix Timestamp (Milliseconds)
UnixTimestampMs.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds since epoch

ISO8601DateTime.title: ISO 8601 DateTime
ISO8601DateTime.description: Date and time in ISO 8601 format

SafeFloat.title: Safe Float Module
SafeFloat.description: Floating-point operations with NaN and infinity handling

FiniteFloat.title: Finite Float
FiniteFloat.description: Finite floating-point number (no NaN or infinity)

SafeAngle.title: Safe Angle Module
SafeAngle.description: Angle representation and conversion (degrees, radians, turns)

SafeBuffer.title: Safe Buffer Module
SafeBuffer.description: Bounded buffer operations with overflow protection

SafeQueue.title: Safe Queue Module
SafeQueue.description: Thread-safe queue operations with bounded capacity

SafeBloom.title: Safe Bloom Module
SafeBloom.description: Probabilistic bloom filter with configurable false positive rate

SafeLru.title: Safe LRU Module
SafeLru.description: Least Recently Used cache with bounded capacity

SafeGraph.title: Safe Graph Module
SafeGraph.description: Graph data structures with safe traversal

SafeRateLimiter.title: Safe Rate Limiter Module
SafeRateLimiter.description: Rate limiting algorithms (token bucket, sliding window, fixed window)

SafeCircuitBreaker.title: Safe Circuit Breaker Module
SafeCircuitBreaker.description: Circuit breaker pattern for fault tolerance

SafeRetry.title: Safe Retry Module
SafeRetry.description: Retry strategies with exponential backoff and jitter

SafeStateMachine.title: Safe State Machine Module
SafeStateMachine.description: Type-safe state machines with validated transitions

SafeTensor.title: Safe Tensor Module
SafeTensor.description: Multi-dimensional array operations with shape validation

SafeMl.title: Safe ML Module
SafeMl.description: Machine learning model validation and inference safety

SafeHeader.title: Safe Header Module
SafeHeader.description: HTTP header operations with CRLF injection prevention

SafeCookie.title: Safe Cookie Module
SafeCookie.description: HTTP cookie operations with security attributes

SafeContentType.title: Safe Content Type Module
SafeContentType.description: MIME type validation and content type handling

Result.title: Result
Result.description: Result type for operations that can fail
